website_summaries.verdict: A quality table and a sound deal. The best choice if you're watching your budget.
pros: Solid design that's easy to fold and move
Resin top is easy to clean and resists stains, scratches, impact
Has powder-coated legs and top that folds in the middle
cons: With a capacity of 300 lbs., it's less sturdy than some, but it's still a well-made option

customer_reviews.title: Good table for price.
customer_reviews.text: Used two of these to seat 14 people this thanksgiving. Held up very well, no wobbling or noise, held up to leaning on it, dishes, wine bottles - I definitely wouldn’t sit on it however. Definitely happy with this table, although it’s a bit heavy it’s ok since that makes it more durable.
customer_reviews.author: BUSINESS MAN

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for what you get & smelly with fumes on top of it
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in quality and materials! Before we even got them out of the box, the horrible fumes outgassing from the plastic tops flooded our house. Two of us got headaches and one a stomach ache from the smell. Sub-par. We decided to purchase 2 of these tables although the price seemed high-- mistake, do not recommend this company due to their poor quality & TOXIC MATERIALS used in order to have CHEAP production costs. NOT what we need in this world.
customer_reviews.author: zounds

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sit flat - bows up at the fold
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, the box was damaged and smelled terrible! Then I opened it, the table smelled terrible, AND it wouldn't sit flat. Even after I tried weighing down the middle where it folds, it wouldn't sit flat, and it was so sloped that my books were slipping off the sides...
customer_reviews.author: Vivian L.

customer_reviews.title: Table has sagged
customer_reviews.text: Have had this table for 6 months. We used it as a computer desk. The table has sagged very badly where the computer is sitting. The product details state that this table holds 300 lbs. This table has not held up and we are now unable to use it. We were told the warranty is already up.
customer_reviews.author: Financially Free

customer_reviews.title: Product was advertised like new, but came all dinged up and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was advertised like new, but came all dinged up and not flat in center. Will not work well for putting large puzzles together as I intended. I would have spent a few bucks more on a brand new one had I realized this would not be in the like new condition as advertised. Definitely disappointed. Photos attached show opposite sides of the center & one of the far corners.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J.

customer_reviews.title: Decent table for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to help with my butchering. I have a small kitchen with no counter space and was looking for a table that could add space when I need it. I buy roasts a few times a year and cut them into steaks or grind them for ground meat. I didn't want to spend hundreds on something I'll use only a handful of times a year. I'm also physically disabled so I need something that I could move on my own. I'm not concerned about the bowing in the middle of the table like others but if I wanted to use this for meals or displaying I would be more bothered by the bowing.
customer_reviews.author: articulomortis85

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived dented in the top at two places, creating an uneven surface. Also a screw fell off when we took it out of the box. Sadly this has to go back. The packaging is minimal and there seems to be a dent at the box corresponding to the debt of the table top. Two stars because of poor packaging and suspect material that was dented
customer_reviews.author: Mary. E.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad it's flat
customer_reviews.text: Folding tables tend to have a problem where the two halves are slanted and there's a gap in the middle, which means you can't put anything at the middle of the table, which is the place you most want to sit. This table doesn't have that problem. It sits completely flat, so the middle can be used for placing things on. Pro tip: When you get it out of the box, open it up and expose the carrying handle from inside. It's held in place with a velcro loop.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Since 1997

customer_reviews.title: quality control failure
customer_reviews.text: in our ministry we use large tables for sorting donations and packing boxes for shipment. In the past these tables have been quite adequate. We just ordered and received four more tables but one of the four arrived with a very clear defect in the top. It appears to be a palm print or depression which makes the top no longer flat. Rather than return table we elected to keep it because the appearance is not that important to her work but we are not impressed by the quality as we once were. we also note that the strong plastic handles have now been replaced with what appear to be spun cloth handles which are much harder to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Riess

customer_reviews.title: Good tables
customer_reviews.text: I needed rectangular table to set food for a backyard party so bought 2 of these but ended up using for seating in backyard as we had more guests that day. They did the job and can seat 6-8 people. They fold easily and one person can carry them with the handle. Just be careful like the other reviewers mentioned that there's a bend in the center but if you put table cloth its not visible and is sturdy enough
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect puzzle table.
customer_reviews.text: Great puzzle table! I've been looking for a while and this Table fits the bill perfectly. It's wide enough, long enough and sturdy enough for everything that I will be using it for. It definitely will work for people to eat on it and do what ever you needed to do and small enough to store easily anywhere. It does have a little weight to it but that's what makes it sturdy and you can't beat the price. 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: C. DeMar

customer_reviews.title: Overall a fine table but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a fine table but knocking off a star because the latch doesn't stay closed. I have another similar table that just stays closed with a pressure clip. This hinged latch is too loose and flops open easily. There doesn't appear to be a way to tighten it either. I may try to put some glue in it to create friction in the hinge...
customer_reviews.author: SynePDX

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I need this table for Christmas dinner
customer_reviews.text: Table is dented. Very disappointed. I need this table for Christmas dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Table is great, BEWARE other sellers
customer_reviews.text: Table itself is great, thus the 5 star review. Nice light gray color, heavy duty, easy to carry around and set up. HOWEVER! I ordered a second table from the same exact amazon sell page, sold by InHome, and instead got a COSCO table which was much flimsier and even came dented. DON'T BUY FROM ANYONE OTHER THAN AMAZON OR OFFICE STAR! Sure it might be a few bucks more but the real table is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We bought to host dinner parties in our tiny apartment. This has been perfect. It's on the narrow side so we can't load it up with too many plates and place setting but sits 6 people comfortably. It's light weight and folds down thin enough to be stored behind a bed. It's quite sturdy. The locking mechanism on the legs keeps them open without worry that they will collapse and we haven't noticed any wobbling. The handles are surprisingly helpful.
customer_reviews.author: G&KTripleA

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed/wanted and far cheaper than I was expecting! I was planning on something over $100! The handle is packed away so don’t be concerned when you open it and don’t see it - open up the table :). Currently set up as a desk, wanted a temporary solution that wasn’t too big and did t cost a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S

customer_reviews.title: Good Table
customer_reviews.text: The table is everything I expected! I took 2 stars off because the company charges close to $10.00 more a table....totally my fault for not sending them back....we are in quarantine and I didn't feel like lugging them to the UPS Store! The table itself is good....look at other sellers an compare prices!
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in this table
customer_reviews.text: table had a big dent in the end. It doesn't sit "flush" when unfolded. I am using it in a workshop, instead of a table for get togethers. I was very disappointed in this table, but didn't want to spend the time or energy sending it back. I seemed as though it went through a war zone in shipping. There are nicer and CHEAPER ones at Menards, Walmart, etc!!
customer_reviews.author: toimdawoim

customer_reviews.title: Good sized but a little wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This table is larger than I expected which is good but arrived with some damaged. While the damage is minor I do have concerns that it could easily be dented in use so we’ll see. I will say the table seems a bit wobbly when fully put together so I’m hoping with use this does not become an issue. I mainly plan to use this table for sewing projects and to set up food whenever we have guests.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan B

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what I could possibly add. I read others reviews. This is perfect for events and extra table space for company. Solid. Stable. Very sturdy. Portable. It is heavy so could be difficult for some to carry. I accidentally cracked the corner coming out of the box. I should have just cut the box open around it. I can deal with that since I'm mostly alternating between using it as a crafting space or with a table cloth for events and visitors. Thinking of getting a second table for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Krimson Skye

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received the table very fast but has 3 damaged corners.
customer_reviews.author: Rooz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table for the Money
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a really nice table. Set it up in about two minutes, and once set up, it sat on the floor perfectly balanced without any rocking. Also, the legs at each end are far enough in so you can get a chair up to the table ends and eat in a comfortable position. We needed an extra table for T-Day and with a table cloth and some stack chairs we have an immediate solution.
customer_reviews.author: Dave from Maine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for craft fairs
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for craft fairs I have to travel to. It's sturdy, but not too heavy, and easy to fold out. It's collapsable and has several latches to secure things properly. I was worried it would be dinged up based on a few reviews, but mine arrived in pristine condition!
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Liu

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that it folds up and can be ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this Table back in December to use as an all purpose table. It came in handy for wrapping presents and I will use it as needed for other things as well. I love the fact that it folds up and can be stored so easily! One can ALWAYS use a table like this. The uses are so variable - to have when Company overflow needs a place to eat - to Grandchildren needing a place to do their Art projects. Great Quality and Value!
customer_reviews.author: Ann OSteen

customer_reviews.title: Table is gray
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these tables thinking they were off white, but they are gray. The legs are a darker gray, but the table top is definitely gray, not off white. Bought off white tables from Target and for lower price, too. The tables themselves are sturdy, though one of them arrived scuffed on the edge. (but I returned both)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Worked out well
customer_reviews.text: The availability and the price makes it hard not give a five star. This is a good quality table. We used it on numerous occasions now and it worked perfectly for us. Will buy another if will need a folding table again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, mostly flat, and just a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table, and probably the best out of all the different ones my relatives have. I can instantly recognize my table based on how flat it is compared to the others when opened, and by the darker color. It's sturdier, and as a result on the heavier side. I definitely prefer eating on this one than the others since it doesn't feel like it will tip over or slide away.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Vo

customer_reviews.title: Table is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived hours earlier than expected, and came in great condition. It is very solid, and easy to unfold and fold. We had it outside and it rained a lot, and table held up perfectly. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong here
customer_reviews.text: This table is admirably serving its purpose for game night, and as an ad-hoc dining table for now (just moved). Construction seems solid, but I probably wouldn't sit on it or anything. Its also nice that one person can open or close this without too much fuss (super easy for 2 people). I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: It's a good solid table for the price. I chose to use this as my home office desk, because it was hard to find an office desk of this size (I also considered building one, but got lazy). The tabletop is a bit thick (1.75in), which doesn't allow me to use some accessories meant for office desks, but that's not a fault of the table, but my decision. PROS: - Opens and closes fairly easily - Sturdy - Affordable for large table CONS: - Not the nicest looking table (not really a con, depending on what you're using it for)
customer_reviews.author: V.L.

customer_reviews.title: It was sturdy and held up my heavy shelf display during a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a plastic table. if you are familiar with the type then you know they are prone to damage - that is the price you pay for a lighter table. This still has some weight, but is much less bulky then other tables I have. This folds, but retains a fair degree of structural integrity when properly assembled. It was sturdy and held up my heavy shelf display during a craft show. I paired this with a fitted polyester tablecloth linen and was quite happy with the combination.
customer_reviews.author: East Aurora Shopper

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, sturdy table that's not too heavy to lug around. The carrying handle and the latch to keep it closed while lugging it around are nice features. With rounded corners and edges, it's good for clumsy folk like me, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Bennett Boyington

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is extremely handy. We host Thanksgiving at our house every year and this allows us to easily accommodate everyone. We've used it the last two years for Thanksgiving and then again for my husband's crawfish boil birthday party. Then it folds up neatly. I store it behind a little couch in the dining room, and you can't even see it. My only issue is that it is a little "peaked" in the middle at the hinge, but with a nice table cloth and a centerpiece you can't even tell. This is a great option if you need the flexibility of another dining table sometimes, but don't have a lot of space to store one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Welchman

customer_reviews.title: Serving their purpose but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: 'Ok' quality. I am using two of these in my laundry room as a folding table and they definitely serve their purpose (easier to fold large blankets and sheets on a big surface). However I noticed for whatever reason, the tables do not unfold completely flat (the middle where the joint is, will not open all the way). Some areas which don't affect its performance were also a bit bent upon delivery. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MMN

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: Great table (I bought 2 myself). I use this table as a side desk. One note if you are writing on this desk it is slightly roughed, which will cause your writing to be altered. What I do is use a notebook or a clipboard and write on that surface. The table folds nicely took about 5 minutes to unbox and have it set up (I purchased the 6-feet, center folding)
customer_reviews.author: Average-Connoisseur

customer_reviews.title: 6 FT Folding Table
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived--packaged well. Set up was easy--no assembly required. Product was exactly as described. The center seam was flush and there wasn't a hump in them as some described. Tables are a little heavy but the handle makes transporting easier. Just a heads up--the handle is in the inside of table and you won't see it until you unfold the table for set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We hadn't found good ones until we found these
customer_reviews.text: I own an event company, and buy a LOT of tables. We hadn't found good ones until we found these. They latch well, they have handles, and they are sturdy. The only thing that would make them perfect is if they had wheels. Overall, if you have a need for tables, these are the ones that you should get. Ours have held up over the ones we have purchased from the Big Box home improvement stores (and trust me, they take a good beating). The latch alone is great on them- it secures on the top rather than clicking together.
customer_reviews.author: DogmomMKE

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for several things. I use it to sew. Play card games. Plan budgets. Arts and crafts. Extra buffet table. Very sturdy and useful. Keep it clean and take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: SayaM

customer_reviews.title: very useful !
customer_reviews.text: bought this table to use for blocking knitted items--its perfect==will agree it is a bit heavy but STURDY-a great price and perfect for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: katemm

customer_reviews.title: Not highest quality but still a nice table
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged (dented) on the corner but it didn't interfere with the sturdiness and it was small enough that I didn't mind. It's incredibly easy to set up and take down. Stores nicely and the handle helps with carrying the table. Overall, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Swanyxxiv

customer_reviews.title: Good table, latch to fold can be difficult
customer_reviews.text: Overall, solid table. The legs extend and attach easily. Our only complaint and it is minor is the latch that holds the table together when folded. We've had to use some wd-40 twice now to loosen it up. And since the table is plastic, the screws to loosen the latch doesn't really work too well. But it's a table... it serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: S Young

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to open up or fold up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use outdoors as a potting bench. Most of the actual potting benches require you to stand up and I have hours of repotting to do. I like the size, it is easy to hose off, dry off and put back away. It could also be used to have a dinner outdoors just by throwing a table cloth on it, or what ever else you want to use if for.
customer_reviews.author: Chaunie L

customer_reviews.title: I didn't open this table from the box right away ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open this table from the box right away then two spots a corner and in the middle on the table top got damaged. It was closed to return window dates. Yes I should open it soon but didn't doubt...ugh...
customer_reviews.author: T. J

customer_reviews.title: Cross your fingers when you open the box!
customer_reviews.text: Table was received damaged in the center corners where it folds, the damage wouldn't allow the table to completely fold flat, everything else about the table seemed fine as far as function. The table top plastic is very soft for this price point so it wouldn't take a drop of much height to dent it up . It's a grab bag so be ready to file for a return if you get one of the lemons.
customer_reviews.author: Jerico

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered two of these tables, then went back and ordered another. I agree with other reviews....it does seem to bow up in the middle a bit. I'm not sure if actually putting things on the table will help with that, but they are still a great deal. We purchased them for a graduation party, and they seem like they will hold up well. Big bonus....they fold up when not in use! A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: So far we are pleased with this table
customer_reviews.text: So far we are pleased with this table. It came quickly, just in time for a large gathering at our house. Table seems sturdy enough to use as a worktable for our workshop if needed. I like the fact that it folds in half to save space, and that it is less than 4" thick when folded. I also like the latch that keeps the table folded while being carried. (Have struggled before with tables that lacked that feature!) This product is about the same size as an old fashioned "card table," and offers a lot more useful table surface.
customer_reviews.author: Elder Jim

customer_reviews.title: Quite heavy
customer_reviews.text: Quite heavy. There are some advantages to having something this dirty to cook on and eat on. However it is so heavy that it makes it difficult to use for camping. I would think it’s designed for use around the house instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable, Foldable, Has a Handle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these tables to act as a replacement for my giant desk I had in my bedroom. I wanted something that I felt safe putting my desktop computer on, but I could also easily fold it up and put it in my trunk when I move out. This table feels very sturdy, it's made of a nice, hard plastic. I feel very safe putting my desktop computer on this, and it's also very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Dirtt Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Like the ease and functionality of this table
customer_reviews.text: Like the ease and functionality of this table. Disappointed because the description states it's off-white. Nope, It's grey! Kept it to have around the house when I need an extra table. I just put a tablecloth over it so no one knows it's grey and not off-white.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we have needed for so many parties and events
customer_reviews.text: Love these. We ordered three for a recent birthday party but they have come in incredibly handy for a number of parties and events since then. This is one of those items you keep telling yourself "Hmmm.... I should buy but.... ehhh.... when am I ever going to use it again?" Well trust me, once you get these you'll suddenly find yourself with a number uses you never anticipated. The surface is almost perfectly flat when in use and the ability to fold these in half for easy storage is also complemented by the locking mechanism and the convenient handle. Nothing fancy, nothing special, but more useful than you will ever imagine once you get a few.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Noah

customer_reviews.title: Good for a gaming table
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, movable, but sturdy. I like that it folds and has a handle. I put a green felt on top and it works great for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: David K. vun Kannon

customer_reviews.title: not even, doesn't open fully, doesn't stay open. Lump in middle
customer_reviews.text: this table doesn't open fully, has a lump where sides met. while trying to pull table up on to the legs it keeps closing. Once the table is set up it is nowhere close to being even or level.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to ship without damage
customer_reviews.text: I love these tables, but am tired of having to return them because of damage in shipping. I finally gave up and resolved to buy them from my local retailer.
customer_reviews.author: P O.

customer_reviews.title: Really Strong!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this in my art studio, and it is a serious table. I had a little bit of trouble getting one of the metal rings to lock, but with a hammer it went into place no problem. I was a bit worried about the weight I was placing on top (paintings) but once I had it unfolded and in place I saw just how heavy duty it was and was no longer concerned. Great, well made table!
customer_reviews.author: EH Sherman

customer_reviews.title: I love the table for it fits just right in heidt ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the table for it fits just right in heidt and width. Now what I don't like, I have only used it two times and the one side of the table is lifting highter than the other side. I need for it to stay flat on both sides, at the present time it is not too bad, but will it continue to lift as time goes on?
customer_reviews.author: C. Keck

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, sent to a friend in PA. She loved it, everything about it and said it would be around for a long time. A sturdy table. Her words, not mine. I hope she liked it as much as she portrayed she did!
customer_reviews.author: Lover of all things Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: TABLE WAS RECEIVED DAMAGED ACROSSED THE ENTIRE END OF TABLE TOP WITHOUT DAMAGE TO BOX! BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Pamelyn

customer_reviews.title: Always ready for a sales event!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a silversmith and we occasionally do show. I have a GMC Canyon with a very short bed and lugging a larger table around was always a lot of planning and honestly caused us to pass on doing a lot of smaller shows. I bought two of these tables and I can leave them in the bed of my truck(camper shell), along with our tarp and trolley and we are now ready to accept shows on a whim. Our sales have picked up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Thom Linders

customer_reviews.title: It folds in half
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our camper. It folds in half and stores in our mid-tack area of our horse trailer. Accompanied with a nice table cloth, we really enjoy having a table to eat at and have friends over to our campsite.
customer_reviews.author: Nina H.

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Using this table for craft projects right now for the last few months and i love how it folds up and is put out of the way easily. Have had zero issues with the table so far and am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is probably more like 4-5 stars, but for my purpose which is jigsaw puzzles, it only rates 3 because of where it folds together. Reviews said no hump in the middle. But edges do not fit tightly together and one side is higher than the other so table is not level in the middle. Smooth surface and very sturdy but I am disappointed because of the lack of close meshing when opened
customer_reviews.author: golden reader

customer_reviews.title: hard to carry
customer_reviews.text: table is great but I had to carry it from my car to a picnic spot and it was a two person job only because there is no handle or appropriate indention to use as a handle. I would return but already recycled the box. ugh
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Bradanini

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase tired of having to borrow family members who don't take care of stuff and spending hours scrubbing just so it's presentable for my occasion just to return so the process repeats very counter intuitive.. So I bought this table and no renting out lol..
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if you're looking for a cheap desk
customer_reviews.text: I was running out of my savings and I couldn't afford a proper desk. This $50 table worked better than my last $300 desk I had to throw away after moving. I finally get the leg room I needed. I am 5'11" and the height is perfect. I have two monitors, laptop, and several large manuals I use for work, it holds the weight very well. The surface is smooth enough to write on. Even after two monitors and fairly large laptop, I still have plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two halves = a whole lot of table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table because it folds in half. When it arrived all I had to do was unfold it. Genius! Whomever invented this deserves a Klondike bar. Man, I could really go for a Klondike bar right now. Maybe I’ll unfold my trusty folding table and eat one on it right now. Totally worth the extra calories. If you’re looking for a lightweight, easy to operate folding table, look no further folks (Klondike bars sold separately).
customer_reviews.author: Jayven Comaroy, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: REALLY heavy table! I didn't realize this when I was purchasing it, though. This makes it difficult for me to use sometimes. It stands really well, though. Definitely need an extra person to lug it around for markets or something, though.
customer_reviews.author: darian gravv

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and large
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cheap desk that was large and sturdy and this fit the need perfectly. Has two laptops, keyboard printer, little office drawer set, an office light, and a personal fan on it all the time and there's still room for other things to place on it. When I get a real desk this will be a perfect set up table for years to come. It folds up well and has a handle for easy storage and moving. I am satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, uneven surface
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, uneven surface. Have had it for less than a year and the crack where the table folds in half is beginning to widen so stuff falls in there and get stuck. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Own It Rather Than Rent!
customer_reviews.text: Liked how sturdy it is. Pale gray color is nice when used with other tables (white). Needed one more table for event at church. It was cheaper to buy this one, have it delivered. Future uses are abundant especially when you just need one more table.
customer_reviews.author: Noodles

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen table
customer_reviews.text: I needed a table for my kitchen and everything was so expensive and I found this on Amazon which was similar to what table I had bought at Cosco. I am so happy I bought this table on Amazon it's now in my kitchen as my kitchen table. Is this high-quality it's sturdy and worth every penny.when I have some extra money I'm going to get one to use as a desk in my living room
customer_reviews.author: thebarbecuemaster

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these tables! They are sturdy, easy to clean, and easy to set up and take down. They are a little heavier than I anticipated, but I think that speaks to the quality. I am very happy with this purchase. They held up to a gaggle of teenagers bumping them, sitting on them, and spilling things on them, and looked as good as new after a quick wipe with a rag. I look forward to many years of use from these.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine with easy storage
customer_reviews.text: I basically use it just a few times a year and then it works just fine. It is slightly wider than the non folding resin tables that I have which is also great for what I use it for. Easier storage than the non folding table.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn CPA

customer_reviews.title: Will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This table is admittedly nothing flashy, but it is highly useful and exactly as advertised. If you need a sturdy, folding table, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: 4 star
customer_reviews.text: Nice little table that are easy to clean up. We take them camping and they work good for that.
customer_reviews.author: horselady

customer_reviews.title: These tables are not well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 tables and all were defective. They were warped in the middle, had areas where the mounding has come through, or were creased on the edge. They don’t lock in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette A.

customer_reviews.title: Grandma approved, great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle table! Got it for my grandma for our growing family dinners. She uses it for everything! I don't know why we didn't think of a folding one all along. It stores easily and just being able to maneuver it makes all the difference. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: LDB22

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this table
customer_reviews.text: It is easily trasportable and is very sturdy when I put alot of my belongings on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good Utility Table
customer_reviews.text: Great utility table. I use it as an extra table when I have people over and for kids birthday party. It's durable and easy to open/close. I have seen ones that are a little lighter and cheaper (by $10) at Costco, but I had bought this one already. I might get the Costco one over this because it weighs a bit less and easier to lug around. But overall, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RBR

customer_reviews.title: Folds in the center without being wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: Love that this table folds in the center without being wobbly. It is sturdy, easy to clean, and takes up minimal storage. It's close to 2" when folded and works great for kid's crafts or as an extra table for a party. I highly recommend it and recommend buying it on amazon so that it is delivered directly to your front door.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob and Kiki HantlaTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Great Versitile / Foldable Table
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Amazon - delivered within a week. ***Warning said to make sure to check shipment from delivery for damages. Too bad for me, I wasn't home when it arrived! Huge dent on one corner where the table folds. Did I bother to send it back, and go through that entire hastle? NO! I'll write the poor packing and/or delivery monkey poor handling off to the price of doing business. Having said that, what's a dent worth? The table was purchased for basement projects / extra table service for holiday gatherings (will be covered with table cloth now) and for outdoor backyard parties. All this said, it is sturdy and functionable and what I expected - minus the crumpled corner.
customer_reviews.author: CLM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive my table and I'm disappointed. I have a new bank card on file for a refund, please. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Iola D. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Great table, but center does not lock flat
customer_reviews.text: Great portable table, but 1 star deduction because for some reason the center does not lock flat. Not sure if this is an issue with this model or with my specific table. Does the job when any weight is on it and is very sturdy, but whenever I move it short distances without needing to break it down, it bows upward in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy all-purpose table
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, sturdy table that can be used for multiple purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Terrific folding table
customer_reviews.text: This table is easy to set up, then fold for storage. Very sturdy, with locking system both set up and folded.
customer_reviews.author: A. Racek

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Using it as a worktable for my craft work , class or when ever I need extra work surface .. It’s sturdy n easy to fold ..
customer_reviews.author: preety

customer_reviews.title: It's really a fine table
customer_reviews.text: It's really a fine table for a picnic, or something in the garage doesn't fit a beautiful home
customer_reviews.author: Picky shopper

customer_reviews.title: I bought 1 of these tables to use .I wish I had the money to buy the company
customer_reviews.text: Big good looking sturdy well made table that folds up nicely in its own case for easy storage.with a price that you would expect the table to break the day you got it.
customer_reviews.author: michael bramble

customer_reviews.title: The best of its kind.
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what I was looking for. It is easily transported and set up-5 minutes counting removal from package. I can easily fit all my art supplies with elbow room to spare. It is also solid and sturdy. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: eddy

customer_reviews.title: and wanted something that wasn't too expensive but stored easily. This table is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a folding table for yard sales, family gatherings, etc., and wanted something that wasn't too expensive but stored easily. This table is very sturdy, made from hard quality plastic, folds easily, and even has a carrying strap! Really glad I bought this, have used it several times and is very easy to set up and not so heavy that you need two people to unfold it and set it upright.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Really great table
customer_reviews.text: I have a VERY small kitchen and I do a LOT of cooking. I needed to expand my working space and so I bought this table and this table works PERFECTLY! For one thing, it is very sturdy. Also, it is easy to clean, which is extremely important. Also, if I ever want to take it down and store it way, It is easy to do so. All and all, I don't think you can find a better buy on a table like this, and I recommend it highly, Sincerely, Ross (Cheyenne, WY)
customer_reviews.author: Ross Bagne

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but not lightweights
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these tables, they are lightweight but not lightweights, meaning they are easy to carry and set up and yet are not flimsy. I doubt you could park a car on them but but under normal non-abusive usage I think they will last for a good many years. Would I buy more of them? If the need arose, absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Anon E. Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and functional. Excellent quality. I use mine as a sewing and cutting table. There is absolutely no wobble in this table. It very sturdy and strong, while also being portable.
customer_reviews.author: 04rk88

customer_reviews.title: Good Tables Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The tables themselves are well designed and I was happy with them. I needed these quickly for a trade show and so I could not return them before I needed to use them. I ordered two and both were damaged on the corner of the tables. Although it does not affect the use of the table it is annoying to pay full price for a product that is damaged. If I had time I would have returned them both for new ones. Keep this in mind when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: John Fedorjaka  & Margaret  Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Table Price Questionable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these tables. The quality is decent and they have sustained the weather. I went to order another table only to discover a 20% increase in price within 4 months. I discovered a comparable table at Target for half the price. As with most items mfr in China build quality varies. I will know more once I try the Target table.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Well built, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built product. I have 3 of them. The fact that they fold make them much easier to transport and carry.
customer_reviews.author: FisterD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camping table!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camping table. Way cheaper than anything I could purchase at REI or even Walmart given it's extra length. Folds up awesome to throw in the back of any car or SUV for a camping trip or whatever you need. I will agree with other reviewers that it will bow slightly up in the middle, so it might not be the best desk set up. That being said, it's awesome for tailgating or camping.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Not Flat!
customer_reviews.text: This table will not open up to a flat surface. I ordered it to use in my sewing room. It has been stored in the garage because the hump in the middle made it impossible to cut fabric on my mat.
customer_reviews.author: Greythound

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the table I was looking for. It is six feet long, folds up nicely with the legs tucked in and secure, folds in half and has a nice carrying handle. I just used it for serving a large buffet meal for my family and it was perfect. Sturdy. Arrived in perfect condition, as it was double boxed. I would say it is definitely grey and not an off-white. For where I am using it, I actually like the grey better, so thanks !!
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great Table and very Sturdy! Put a large Table Cloth and Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Kalman

customer_reviews.title: Color description is definitely inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: It’s a gray table. Not off white at all. I needed a white or off white table and this shows up leaving me to go to WalMart yo buy an actual off-white table. Waste of my time and my money and it’s a pain to do a return and spend even more energy and time dealing with something that isn’t what it said it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Office Star Resin Multipurpose Rectangle Table, 6-Feet, Center Folding
product_meta.description:
6' Resin Center Fold Multi Purpose Table

AMAZON.COM
An economical, user-friendly choice for offices, classrooms, and events, Office Star's resin furniture offers lightweight yet durable solutions to workspace, dining, and seating needs. This 6-foot center-fold multipurpose table features a heavy-duty white top crafted of waterproof, stainproof, scratch-, and impact-resistant blow-mold resin and a dark gray powder-coated steel frame with double side support rails for added stability. Rubber end caps protect floors from damage, and the legs tuck into the folded top to allow stackable, space-saving storage. The table holds up to 300 pounds and is ideal for indoor or outdoor use. Cleaning is easy, and the table weighs just 34 pounds with a sturdy handle and end lock so it can go where duty calls. --Kara Karll
feature_bullets: Open table on first use to unleash Handle that is Velcroed inside the table .6-foot center-fold multipurpose table with carrying handle and lock
Heavy-duty blow-mold off-white resin top and gray powder-coated steel tube frame
Waterproof, stainproof, scratch- and impact-resistant; ideal for indoor or outdoor use.
Sets up and cleans easily; folds flat for storage
Dimensions-72W x 30D x 28.25H inches. Holds 300 pounds
